2018–, net/collective.

Piraba Association

pira (noun): a mischievous wandering sprite in the form of a pyramid with a halo
piraba (noun): “Land of Pira”

Piraba is my Discord server, free for anyone to join. Many of us are artists, musicians, designers, or otherwise creators. Occasionally we draw together via Drawpile or listen to music together in the voice channel. We also have a Minecraft server. My handle is @ncb0#0408.

Isla Piraba

Isla Piraba is my space in Second Life, located next to Conejo Island in Lendrum. In June 2020, we hosted the first event here—conejoBeat+. In autumn 2020, we hosted conejoBeat season 1. In February 2021, we hosted LUCKY CONEJOBEAT.
